title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 2 points:
1 point: properties
1 point: explanation

The terms in this alternating series decrease in absolute value and lim n→∞ 1 nlnn =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4449@ . Therefore, the Alternating Series Test guarantees that this series converges. Furthermore,

1 3ln3 − 1 4ln4 < sum < 1 3ln3 < 1 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4E30@

Therefore, the sum of the series is less than 1 3 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@@388C@
